channel.title: Posts on Safe Cardano
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Safe Cardano

item.description: About Us Safe Cardano is ran by IT professionals with over decade of experience in designing and implementing enterprise solutions for a range of organisations. We are experts in DevOps and SRE especially in building and operating secure, high available and reliable distributed Linux Systems. Now working on the Cardano project and on other Open source projects. Now we are involved in the Cardano movement and hosting this pool as an initial effort to contribute and learn from this project
